original_text: And he looked toward Sodom and Gomorrah, and toward all the land of the plain, and beheld, and, lo, the smoke of the country went up as the smoke of a furnace.
korean_text: 소돔과 고모라와 그 온 지역을 향하여 눈을 들어 연기가 옹기 가마의 연기같이 치솟음을 보았더라

sentences.original_text: And he looked toward Sodom and Gomorrah
and toward all the land of the plain
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 평지의 모든 땅을 향해 보았으며

sentences.original_text: and beheld, and, lo, the smoke of the country
went up as the smoke of a furnace
